entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
